title: Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam Lyrics Eththan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Vijay Yesudas, Saindhavi
Song:Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam
Movie: Eththan
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar
Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Nenjil therigirathe
Manasukul etho, Manasukul etho, minnal idikirathe
Paniyin thuligal vizhum pothu,
ilaigal ariyaathe
Unnmugam parthu unnudan irundhaalÂ 
thooram kuraikirathe

Varthai solla thudipathai, Un parvai sollkirathe
Mounam polave oru mozhithaan yethadi
Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Nenjil therigirathe

Ethanayo payanangal vandhathu ponathu ithupol yethumillai
Ennai vittu thalli nindru ennai nane parkiren, paravasam kurayavillai
kathimel nadakum maayam
Indha kadhalil nadakkum, endha valigalum inithidume
Buthiyinai kulappum
aanal manadhuku pidikum, adhu marupadi kulapidume
Kadhal adhu pollaladhu, Kollamale kollum adhu
koocham aacham illadhadhu haiyo haiyo..

Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Nenjil therigirathe
Manasukul etho, Manasukul etho, minnal idikirathe

Chinnathoru punnagai ennenavo pannudhu, ennake puriyavillai
Puyal vandha padagena pulangalum thudikudhu, karaye theriyavillai
Kannil oru kanavu,Vidindhal adhu kanidhida periyadhu,
aanal manam nambivida marukiradhe
Renduketta vayasu, medhuvaai oru thundilai poduthu
Mansum adhil mattikitu mulikiradhu

Penne naalai enna nadakum,
Unnai ennai kanavidikum
Penne naalai enna nadakum,
Unnai ennai....

Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Nenjil therigirathe
Manasukul etho, Manasukul etho, minnal idikirathe

Varthai solla thudipathai, Un parvai sollkirathe
Mounam polave oru mozhithaan yethadi
Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Nenjil therigirathe

Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam, Nenjil therigirathe
Manasukul etho, Manasukul etho, minnal idikirathe

seo.title: Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam Lyrics Eththan Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Mazhaiyudhir Kaalam Lyrics Eththan Song Lyrics from Eththan. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Taj Noor and sung by Saindhavi. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Eththan, Taj Noor, Saindhavi, Vijay Yesudas, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
